Don't see a pool you joined? Import it: Don't see a pool you joined? Import it
Liquidity Provider Info: Liquidity providers earn a 0.25% fee on all trades proportional to their share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.
Add Liquidity Tip: Tip: When you add liquidity, you will receive pool tokens representing your position. These tokens automatically earn fees proportional to your share of the pool, and can be redeemed at any time.
Add Liquidity Info: By adding liquidity you'll earn 0.25% of all trades on this pair proportional to your share of the pool. Fees are added to the pool, accrue in real time and can be claimed by withdrawing your liquidity.
First Liquditiy Provider Notice: You are the first liquidity provider. The ratio of tokens you add will set the price of this pool. Once you are happy with the rate click supply to review.
Remove Liqudity Tip: Tip: Removing pool tokens converts your position back into underlying tokens at the current rate, proportional to your share of the pool. Accrued fees are included in the amounts you receive.
SushiBar: Make SUSHI work for you: SushiBar: Make SUSHI work for you
SushiBar Info 1: Stake your SUSHI into xSUSHI for ~15% APY. No impermanent loss, no loss of governance rights. Continuously compounding.
SushiBar Info 2: xSUSHI automatically earn fees (0.05% of all swaps, including multichain swaps) proportional to your share of the SushiBar.
Tools Info: Use any tool below to optimize your workflow. Please note, some tools are experimental so use with discretion. If theres a smart contract involved for the tool, read the code and confirm the keys have been burned.
Import Pool Tip: Tip: Use this tool to find pairs that don't automatically appear in the interface.
Select a token to find your liquidity.
BentoBox Info: BentoBox is a revolutionary new way from SUSHI to interact with dapps on L1 in a highly gas efficient manner. In order to use any one of the decentralized apps below you'll need to first enable them and deposit any erc20 asset to your Bentobox balance.
BentoBox Info Short: BentoBox is new a way to use dapps gas-efficiently and gain extra yield.
